## saber pass

Random Password

### Synopsis

Random generate to password

```
saber pass [flags]
```

### Examples

```
saber pass
```

  -h, --help              help for pass
  -l, --len int           Password length (default 12)
  -t, --type string       Password type: num, char, num-char, mix (default "num-char")
